products.title: Queen Size Platform Bed
products.description: Experience sleek and minimalist design with our queen size platform bed.
products.full_description: Add a touch of modern elegance to your bedroom with our platform bed frame. Crafted from sturdy wood, it features a low-profile design with clean lines, offering a contemporary look that complements any decor style. The platform slats provide ample support for your mattress, ensuring a comfortable night's sleep.
products.additional_information: Available in multiple finishes. Easy assembly required. Mattress sold separately.

products.title: King Size Storage Bed
products.description: Maximize your bedroom space with our king size storage bed.
products.full_description: Optimize your bedroom organization with our storage bed frame. Featuring built-in drawers underneath, it offers ample space to store extra bedding, clothing, or other essentials, keeping your room tidy and clutter-free. The sturdy construction and stylish design make it a practical and aesthetic addition to any bedroom.
products.additional_information: Four spacious drawers. Available in oak or espresso finish. Assembly required.

products.title: Twin Size Bunk Bed
products.description: Provide versatile sleeping options with our twin size bunk bed.
products.full_description: Maximize floor space and add fun to your kids' room with our bunk bed. Built with safety in mind, it features sturdy wood construction and guardrails on the top bunk for added security. The classic design and neutral finish blend seamlessly with any decor, making it a practical and stylish choice.
products.additional_information: Separates into two twin beds. Ladder included. Mattresses not included.

products.title: Full Size Metal Bed Frame
products.description: Upgrade your bedroom with our full size metal bed frame.
products.full_description: Add a contemporary touch to your bedroom with our sleek metal bed frame. Constructed from durable steel, it offers sturdy support and lasting durability. The minimalist design and matte finish create a versatile look that complements various decor styles.
products.additional_information: Easy assembly. Mattress sold separately. Available in black or white.

products.title: California King Size Canopy Bed
products.description: Create a luxurious retreat with our California king size canopy bed.
products.full_description: Transform your bedroom into a lavish sanctuary with our canopy bed frame. Crafted from solid wood, it features elegant detailing and a majestic canopy top, adding a touch of grandeur to your space. The spacious design provides ample room for relaxation and ensures a restful night's sleep.
products.additional_information: Requires assembly. Mattress and canopy curtains not included. Available in cherry or walnut finish.

products.title: Velvet Blackout Curtains
products.description: Luxurious blackout curtains made of high-quality velvet fabric.
products.full_description: These velvet blackout curtains are perfect for creating a cozy and private atmosphere in any room. The thick velvet fabric not only blocks out unwanted light but also helps to regulate room temperature. Available in various sizes and colors to suit your decor.
products.additional_information: Package includes 2 panels. Machine washable. Easy to install with rod pocket design.

products.title: Sheer Voile Window Curtains
products.description: Elegant sheer voile curtains with a subtle shimmering effect.
products.full_description: These sheer voile curtains add a touch of elegance to any room. The lightweight fabric allows soft natural light to filter through while providing a degree of privacy. Perfect for creating a breezy and airy ambiance in your home.
products.additional_information: Package includes 2 panels. Machine washable. Rod pocket and back tab design for easy hanging.

products.title: Patterned Thermal Insulated Curtains
products.description: Stylish thermal insulated curtains featuring a contemporary pattern.
products.full_description: These patterned thermal insulated curtains not only enhance the aesthetic appeal of your space but also provide energy-saving benefits. The triple-weave fabric construction blocks out sunlight and UV rays, reduces outside noise, and helps to maintain room temperature.
products.additional_information: Package includes 2 panels. Machine washable. Grommet top design for easy installation.

products.title: Linen Blend Grommet Curtains
products.description: Classic linen blend curtains with a timeless grommet design.
products.full_description: These linen blend curtains add a touch of sophistication to any room. The breathable fabric offers privacy while still allowing natural light to filter through. Perfect for complementing a variety of decor styles.
products.additional_information: Package includes 2 panels. Machine washable. Grommet top design for easy hanging.

products.title: Striped Sheer Rod Pocket Curtains
products.description: Elegant sheer curtains featuring a classic striped design.
